medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain consistent with previous episodes of GERD.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with postprandial epigastric pain that began after fatty foods, similar to prior attacks of GERD. Symptoms have included abdominal pain and a burning sensation in her throat. The duration and intensity of the pain were not specified. Previous episodes occurred, indicating a progression in symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Asthma/COPD, GERD, Uterine tumor removed years ago, Neurocysticercosis.
